message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,400,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but your asking price is a bit too high for me. I would be willing to pay $1,100,000 for it.

Bob, thanks for your interest and counter-offer.  I understand your perspective, but the value of this product is truly significant.  I could consider coming down to $1,300,000. This is my final offer.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  While I recognize its value, I can't justify going higher than $1,150,000 at this time.
